Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.events

Class ShowErrorEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
javafx.event.Event
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.events.ShowErrorEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class ShowErrorEvent extends javafx.event.Event
Event fired at the root element when an error should be shown.
